Our model.from sentence: Our model achieves state - of - the - art results for both aspect detection and sentiment classification .

Sentic LSTM.heavily reliant on: external knowledge bases and domainspecific embeddings

proposed model.from sentence: It is impressive that the proposed model , equipped only with domainindependent general - purpose GloVe embeddings , outperforms Sentic LSTM , an approach heavily reliant on external knowledge bases and domainspecific embeddings .

Ent Net vs. our model.from sentence:
Ent Net vs. our model .
We see consistent performance gains for our model in both aspect detection and sentiment classification , compared to EntNet , esp. for aspect detection , underlining the benefit of delayed update gate activation .
